title: Sidewall, 1926–31
dimensions: Overall: 238.8 x 50 cm (7 ft. 10 in. x 19 11/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Columns or stripes created by a width of bands of stylized floral and foliage motifs alternating with a narrow, more architectural molding composed of 3 stripes and a square boss. Printed in shades of ocher, brown, black, metallic silver and gold on a lighter yellow ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1926–31.
1926–31. Machine-printed on paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2007-1-2.
